name: Driving to freedom
description:
You were imprisoned in a desert area, and mountains are blocking your way.

You drive your car until you find an exit gate. Problem is that it's locked.

You have noticed 66 terminals on the road, and they seem linked to the exit in some way. You'll also find 66 keycards, with special names. So all you have to do is to insert the right keycard into the right terminal.

As this is a long process, your progress is saved every time you unlock a new terminal.

Beware that you are not alone. There are hostile giant spiders that are ready to chase you, if you enter their territory.

To help you in your task, i added some teleports around, you can see them as big red arrows. they'll lead you to strategical points of the map.
